name: After School Adventure Club and the Case of the Mysterious Sound
name_original: After School Adventure Club and the Case of the Mysterious Sound
description:
Made for the Secret Santa Jam 2020! 

For this jam, each participant writes a letter to Santa, and then receives a letter from a giftee. My giftee unfortunately dropped out midway through the jam but I decided to take on a new one! Here's the letter that inspired this game:

I hope we made a nice game for my giftee and that he enjoys playing it! 💖

This is the first time that we participated in a jam without a dedicated programmer, so we couldn't do anything too complicated. We decided to use Ren'Py and create a visual novel because we were already a little familiar with Twine. The Python syntax gave us a few headaches throughout the jam, but we learned a lot and ultimately had a good time!

🎵 Music by Dorkulon

🎨 Art by Treslapin

📷 Background photos from Pexels and Pixabay
